name: Intersight Alarms Clustering
description: Cluster alarms to identify underlying physical entities or root causes. Many alarms may be related to fewer physical entities than the number of alarms themselves.
expected_outcome: Group alarms into clusters representing underlying physical entities or root causes. For example, 100 alarms might cluster into 5-10 physical device groups.

interpretation_guide.cluster_count: Number of distinct physical entities or root causes identified
interpretation_guide.noise_points: Alarms that don't fit into any clear pattern (may be false alarms or unique issues)
interpretation_guide.cluster_size: Number of alarms per entity/cause (larger clusters may indicate more critical or widespread issues)
